notifiers.success_data: {"content": "Your service '{{.Service.Name}}' is currently back online and was down for {{.Service.Downtime.Human}}."}
notifiers.failure_data: {"content": "Your service '{{.Service.Name}}' is has been failing for {{.Service.Downtime.Human}}! Reason: {{.Failure.Issue}}"}
notifiers.title: Discord
notifiers.description: Send notifications to your discord channel using discord webhooks. Insert your discord channel Webhook URL to receive notifications. Based on the discord webhooker API.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

notifiers.title: Telegram
notifiers.description: Receive notifications on your Telegram channel when a service has an issue. You must get a Telegram API token from the /botfather. Review the Telegram API Tutorial to learn how to generate a new API Token.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

form.title: Telegram API Token
form.small_text: Enter the API Token given to you from the /botfather chat.

form.title: Channel
form.small_text: Insert your Telegram Channel including the @ symbol. The bot will need to be an administrator of this channel.

notifiers.title: Twilio
notifiers.description: Receive SMS text messages directly to your cellphone when a service is offline. You can use a Twilio test account with limits. This notifier uses the Twilio API.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

notifiers.title: Pushover
notifiers.description: Use Pushover to receive push notifications. You will need to create a New Application on Pushover before using this notifier.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

form.title: Application API Key
form.placeholder: Create an Application and insert the API Key here

form.title: Notification Sound
form.placeholder: Choose a sound for this Pushover notification

notifiers.success_data: { "blocks": [ { "type": "section", "text": { "type": "mrkdwn", "text": "The service {{.Service.Name}} is back online." } }, { "type": "actions", "elements": [ { "type": "button", "text": { "type": "plain_text", "text": "View Service", "emoji": true }, "style": "primary", "url": "{{.Core.Domain}}/service/{{.Service.Id}}" }, { "type": "button", "text": { "type": "plain_text", "text": "Go to Statping", "emoji": true }, "url": "{{.Core.Domain}}" } ] } ] }
notifiers.failure_data:
{ "blocks": [ { "type": "section", "text": { "type": "mrkdwn", "text": ":warning: The service {{.Service.Name}} is currently offline! :warning:" } }, { "type": "divider" }, { "type": "section", "fields": [ { "type": "mrkdwn", "text": "*Service:*
{{.Service.Name}}" }, { "type": "mrkdwn", "text": "*URL:*
{{.Service.Domain}}" }, { "type": "mrkdwn", "text": "*Status Code:*
{{.Service.LastStatusCode}}" }, { "type": "mrkdwn", "text": "*When:*
{{.Failure.CreatedAt}}" }, { "type": "mrkdwn", "text": "*Downtime:*
{{.Service.Downtime.Human}}" }, { "type": "plain_text", "text": "*Error:*
{{.Failure.Issue}}" } ] }, { "type": "divider" }, { "type": "actions", "elements": [ { "type": "button", "text": { "type": "plain_text", "text": "View Offline Service", "emoji": true }, "style": "danger", "url": "{{.Core.Domain}}/service/{{.Service.Id}}" }, { "type": "button", "text": { "type": "plain_text", "text": "Go to Statping", "emoji": true }, "url": "{{.Core.Domain}}" } ] } ] }
notifiers.request_info: Slack allows you to customize your own messages with many complex components. Checkout the Slack Message API to learn how you can create your own.
notifiers.title: Slack
notifiers.description: Send notifications to your slack channel when a service is offline. Insert your Incoming webhook URL for your channel to receive notifications. Based on the Slack API.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

form.title: Incoming Webhook Url
form.small_text: Incoming Webhook URL from Slack Apps

notifiers.title: Command
notifiers.description: Shell Command allows you to run a customized shell/bash Command on the local machine it's running on.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

notifiers.title: Webhook
notifiers.description: Send a custom HTTP request to a specific URL with your own body, headers, and parameters.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

form.title: HTTP Endpoint
form.small_text: Insert the URL for your HTTP Requests.

form.title: HTTP Method
form.small_text: Choose a HTTP method for example: GET, POST, DELETE, or PATCH.

form.title: Content Type
form.small_text: Optional content type for example: application/json or text/plain

form.title: Header
form.small_text: Optional Headers for request use format: KEY=Value,Key=Value

notifiers.title: Mobile
notifiers.description: Receive push notifications on your Mobile device using the Statping App. You can scan the Authentication QR Code found in Settings to get the Mobile app setup in seconds.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

form.title: Device Identifiers
form.placeholder: A list of your Mobile device push notification ID's.

notifiers.title: Email
notifiers.description: Send an email when a service becomes offline or back online using Statping's email service. You will need to verify your email address.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

notifiers.title: Gotify
notifiers.description: Use Gotify to receive push notifications. Add your Gotify URL and App Token to receive notifications.
notifiers.author: Hugo van Rijswijk

form.title: Gotify URL
form.small_text: Gotify server URL, including http(s):// and port if needed

form.title: App Token
form.small_text: The Application Token generated by Gotify

notifiers.success_data: {{.Service.Name}} is back online and was down for {{.Service.Downtime.Human}}
notifiers.failure_data: {{.Service.Name}} is offline and has been down for {{.Service.Downtime.Human}}
notifiers.title: Amazon SNS
notifiers.description: Use amazonSNS to receive push notifications. Add your amazonSNS URL and App Token to receive notifications.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

notifiers.title: SMTP Mail
notifiers.description: Send emails via SMTP when services are online or offline.
notifiers.author: Hunter Long

form.title: Disable TLS/SSL
form.small_text: Enabling this will set Insecure Skip Verify to true

notifiers.title: LINE Notify
notifiers.description: LINE Notify will send notifications to your LINE Notify account when services are offline or online. Based on the LINE Notify API.
notifiers.author: Kanin Peanviriyakulkit

form.title: Access Token
form.placeholder: Insert your Line Notify Access Token here.
